0.title: Dafi antibacterial hand and face cleansing wipes
0.description:
• A suitable alternative for washing hands and face instead of soap and water
  • Contains nutrients to repair and regenerate the skin
  • Contains essential vitamins to increase the level of skin immunity
  • Hypoallergenic, suitable for all ages and types of dry, normal and oily skin
  • Contains extracts of aloe vera, marigold and vitamin E to maintain the softness of the skin
  • Free of alcohol, parabens and soap
  • Convenient packaging for carrying in purses and pockets
  • Quantity: 12 sheets
